divs: Sighting DetailsWent out to see the fireworks from my deck when I seen this bright red object come up between the fireworks and the full moon I watched it go straight up like a firework I ask my husband what is this at first I thought it was going to be a big firework,but it started to come towards us then I asked if it was a helicopter but their were no lights flashing and here in Butte we don't have many airplanes fly over us at night and only helicopter for emerengency. Then we watched it fly over the top of us when I ran and got our bonociulars to see what it was and there was only a glowing red ball that seemed to paulsate and it looked as if there was a small cloud around it. It come from out of the south east part and flow to the north west part then just disappeared. It the 4th of July and someone else had to see what we seen tonight.
